quote: The PS3 is a total disaster on so many levels, I think it's really clear that Sony lost track of what customers and what developers wanted.
I've always wanted to be a giant space crab.
I am not willing to talk about that right now.

I'd say, even at this late date, they should just cancel it and do a 'do over'. Just say, 'This was a horrible disaster and we're sorry and we're going to stop selling this and stop trying to convince people to develop for it.
